programme.title: The Nun II
programme.desc: After her harrowing experience in 1950s Romania, Sister Irene moves to France and enjoys a quieter pace of life, guiding fresh-faced Sister Debra. Cardinal Conroy brings dire news - the ancient evil has escaped from Romania and is moving steadily eastwards across Europe, purpose unknown. He entreats Sister Irene to stop this murderous menace, and Sister Debra defies the Abbess to provide support. programme.desc: Teenager Patricia 'Trish' Weir is committed to putting her kidnapper and rapist Ernesto Miranda in prison, while her life is wrecked by the legal system. programme.title: The Canterville Ghost
programme.sub-title: Action, Fantasy, Drama, Animation, Comedy ║ 2023 ║ PG
programme.desc: According to legend, Sir Simon de Canterville drowned his wife Lady Eleanor in the lake of Canterville Chase and for hundreds of years the nobleman's ghost has been cursed to haunt the manor. American patriarch Hiram B Otis moves from Boston into the country pile with his clan. Daughter Virginia makes her displeasure about the move clear and she forges a pact with Sir Simon to scare her parents back to America. programme.title: Sometimes I Think About Dying
programme.desc: Fran is an office worker who lives in a world of her own on the dreary Oregon coast. At home she leads a solitary, silent existence, and dreams that she's lying dead on a forest floor. Fran eventually struggles to make a connection with a friendly co-worker who takes her on a date. programme.title: My Big Fat Greek Wedding 3
programme.desc: Following the death of her father Gus, Toula Portokalos honours his dying wish to take the entire family to his childhood village and reconnect with their Greek roots. programme.title: Strays
programme.desc: Irrepressibly optimistic Border Terrier Reggie is devoted to his human Doug, until the heartless owner abandons him on city streets. At first, Reggie is in denial but straight-shooting Boston Terrier Bug opens Reggie's eyes to the shocking truth about Doug. programme.title: No Hard Feelings
programme.desc: Faced with the possibility of losing her mother's house, a woman called Maddie answers an advert from a married couple, who are offering a Buick Regal car to anyone willing to 'date' their introverted 19-year-old son Percy before he attends college. Maddie promises to bring the teenager out of his shell. programme.title: Arthur's Whisky
programme.desc: When Joan's husband dies, she discovers he'd invented an anti-aging elixir that literally takes the years off. programme.title: Hypnotic
programme.sub-title: Mystery, Thriller, Drama, Action, Sci Fi ║ 2023 ║ 15
programme.desc: Police detective Danny Rourke is haunted by the abduction of his seven-year-old daughter Minnie from a park. During a bank heist, Danny discovers a photo of his daughter with an instruction to find someone called Dell Rayne. Evidence leads to a psychic Diana Cruz, who introduces the cop to the unseen world of hypnotics - people with the ability to control how we perceive the world. programme.title: Anyone But You
programme.desc: Bea and Ben enjoy an incredible first date, but attraction quickly burns out and they are delighted to be apart. However, fate compels the duo to reconsider, and they seize the opportunity to attend a lavish wedding in Australia, as a couple. The pair pretend to be deliriously in love during the once-in-a-lifetime trip and keep up appearances in front of other guests. programme.title: A Tiger's Journey
programme.desc: In the valleys of the Himalayas, an orphan boy saves a Bengal tiger cub from the poachers who killed the creature's mother. Together they head for a monastery in Bhutan known as the Tiger's Nest, where Buddhist monks took refuge after the 1950 Chinese invasion of Tibet and protect the big cats. programme.title: Golda
programme.desc: In October 1973, Israeli Prime Minister Golda Meir initially refuses to act on intelligence that suggests Egypt and Syria intend to launch a co-ordinated military offensive against Israel. Eventually the attacks begin, catching Minister of Defence Moshe Dayan off guard. Meir refuses to accept his resignation and a weakened Dayan leads the Israeli response, which requires Meir to request air support from US Secretary of State, Henry Kissinger. programme.title: I Now Pronounce You Chuck & Larry

programme.title: To Catch a Killer
programme.desc: Eleanor is a talented but troubled young rookie detective wrestling with the demons of her past, when she is called to the scene of a brutal mass shooting - the work of a new and terrifying murderer. The police and FBI launch a nationwide manhunt, but are thwarted at every turn by the killer's enigmatic, and unprecedented behaviour. Despite her lack of experience, Eleanor is drawn deeper into the case as she, and her newfound mentor, realise that she may be the only person, given her own tortured psyche, who can understand the mind of this singular killer. programme.title: Ferrari
programme.desc: During the summer of 1957, ex-racecar driver Enzo Ferrari is in crisis. Bankruptcy stalks the company he and his wife, Laura, built from nothing a decade earlier. programme.desc: Directionless twenty something Ben Patterson lives with pals John and Martin. All three work at the Trout Plus outdoor goods emporium run by Ben's overbearing father, Farley. programme.title: Please Don't Destroy: The Treasure of Foggy Mountain
programme.desc: Directionless twenty something Ben Patterson lives with pals John and Martin. All three work at the Trout Plus outdoor goods emporium run by Ben's overbearing father, Farley. A random social media post intimates that an old compass, which Ben, John and Martin found as children, could be the missing link to discovering a bust of Marie Antoinette worth an estimated 100million US dollars. Ben resolves to earn his father's respect by unearthing the booty. programme.title: Best Of NFL 23/24
programme.desc: The New York Giants battle the Seattle Seahawks at MetLife Stadium in week four of the NFL. With a 1-2 record, the Giants are out to stop their run of slow first-half starts. (02.10).

programme.title: Chronicles Of A Champion Golfer Padraig Harrington
programme.desc: A look at one of The Open's great champions. Here, the focus is on Irishman Padraig Harrington, a two-time Open winner who took back-to-back titles in 2007 and 2008.

programme.title: Chronicles of a Champion Golfer Johnny Miller
programme.desc: A look at the career of American golfer Johnny Miller, who was one of the world's top players during the mid-1970s, and won The Open in 1976.

programme.title: ATP Final: Rotterdam
programme.desc: In the men's singles final at ATP Rotterdam, the Australian Open champion Jannik Sinner meets the fifth seed Alex de Minaur. Sinner is currently riding a 14-match winning streak. (18.02).

programme.title: Fight Night Int: Lopez v Ortiz
programme.desc: Teofimo Lopez puts his WBO super-lightweight crown on the line in Las Vegas as Jamaine Ortiz challenges the 26-year-old American in what will be his first world title shot. (09.02).

programme.title: T20 Blast Final 2013
programme.desc: A look back at a classic clash from the T20 Blast. Here, the dramatic 2013 final between the Northants Steelbacks and Surrey at Edgbaston.

programme.title: England v W Indies 2nd Test Hlts
programme.desc: Day two of the second Test match between England and the West Indies at Trent Bridge. (19.07).

programme.title: Best of NFL (1hr)
programme.desc: The NFC West-leading San Francisco 49ers host the Tampa Bay Buccaneers in week 11 of the season. The Niners snapped a three-game skid in their dominant week 10 win over the Jaguars. (19.11).

programme.title: Int Rugby Union: NZ v Fiji
programme.desc: Scott Robertson's All Blacks travel to San Diego for a Test match with Fiji. (20.07).

programme.title: S/Lge: St Helens v Warrington
programme.desc: St Helens play host to Warrington Wolves in the Betfred Super League. (19.07).

programme.title: S/Lge: Hull KR v Catalans Hlts
programme.desc: Hull KR host Catalans Dragons in the Betfred Super League. Last time out, the Dragons came away from Perpignan with two points having overcome Huddersfield on home soil. (06.07).

programme.title: Best Of NFL 23/24
programme.desc: Los Angeles Chargers meet an AFC North-leading Baltimore Ravens during week 12. Baltimore secured victory in a big divisional match-up previously, dispatching the Bengals 34-20. (26.11).

programme.title: Best of NFL 23/24 (15mins)
programme.desc: Bitesize highlights as Patrick Mahomes and the Kansas City Chiefs return to the AFC championship game as they face the Ravens in Baltimore. (28.01).

programme.title: Best of NFL 23/24 (15mins)
programme.desc: Bitesize highlights from the second divisional matchup in the NFL playoffs, as the San Francisco 49ers face the Green Bay Packers in the NFC. (20.01).

programme.title: LIVE: Indycar: Practice 2
programme.desc: Through the streets of Exhibition Place, practice running continues for the Ontario Honda Dealers Indy Toronto - the latest stop on the 2024 NTT IndyCar Series calendar. (20.07).

programme.title: Best of NFL 23/24 (15mins)
programme.desc: Bitesize highlights as the San Francisco 49ers and the Detroit Lions advance to the NFC Championship game with a Super Bowl bid on the line. (28.01).

programme.title: Best of NFL 23/24 (15mins)
programme.desc: Bitesize highlights of Super Bowl LVIII, coming from Las Vegas, as the San Francisco 49ers and the Kansas City Chiefs set up a repeat of the same game four years ago. (11.02).

programme.title: LIVE: NFL FLAG Championships
programme.desc: Quarter-final action from the NFL FLAG Championships at the Pro Football Hall of Fame in Ohio. This first-of-its-kind tournament features girls and boys representing NFL Clubs. (20.07).

programme.title: LIVE: NFL FLAG Championships
programme.desc: More quarter-final action from the NFL FLAG Championships at the Pro Football Hall of Fame in Ohio. This first-of-its-kind tournament features girls and boys representing NFL Clubs. (20.07).

programme.title: LIVE: NFL FLAG Championships
programme.desc: More quarter-final action from the NFL FLAG Championships at the Pro Football Hall of Fame in Ohio. This first-of-its-kind tournament features girls and boys representing NFL clubs. (20.07).

programme.title: LIVE: NFL FLAG Championships
programme.desc: More quarter-final action from the NFL FLAG Championships at the Pro Football Hall of Fame in Ohio. This first-of-its-kind tournament features girls and boys representing NFL clubs. (20.07).

programme.title: Fight Night Int:Nakatani v Astrolabio
programme.desc: In Tokyo, Japan, undefeated three-division world champion Junto Nakatani puts the WBC bantamweight title on the line against Vincent Astrolabio of the Philippines. (20.07).

programme.title: Super League Gold
programme.desc: Relive some classic Super League matches. Here, a look back at the 2015 Grand Final, as Leeds Rhinos and Wigan Warriors played out a tense match at Old Trafford.

programme.title: S/Lge: Hull KR v Catalans Hlts
programme.desc: Hull KR host Catalans Dragons in the Betfred Super League. Last time out, the Dragons came away from Perpignan with two points having overcome Huddersfield on home soil. (06.07).

programme.title: S/Lge: Wigan v St Helens Hlts
programme.desc: The Brick Community Stadium's derby day doubleheader concludes with a blockbuster clash between the table-topping champions, Wigan Warriors, and a third-placed Saints outfit. (12.07).

programme.title: My Icon: Natasha Jonas
programme.desc: In the next episode of this special series, Britain's first female Olympic boxer Natasha Jonas discusses the individuals that have inspired her during her life and career.

programme.title: GTWC Europe: Sprint Race 1
programme.desc: Continuing in Germany, the fifth stop on the 2024 GT World Challenge Europe calendar saw sprint race action from Hockenheim.

programme.title: WS/Lge: Wigan v St Helens Hlts
programme.desc: The Brick Community Stadium gets set for a doubleheader with action from the Women's Super League, as Denis Betts' Wigan try to widen the gap at the top with a win over St Helens. (12.07).

programme.title: S/Lge: Hull FC v Hull KR Hlts
programme.desc: For the third time in 2024, Hull FC and Hull KR clash. The last two derbies belonged to the Robins, who have won four of the last five league matches against the Black and Whites. (13.07).

programme.title: ATP Final: Adelaide
programme.desc: In the men's singles final in Adelaide, Jack Draper targets his first title as the 22-year-old Brit faces Jiri Lehecka who is appearing in his second ATP Tour final. (13.01).

programme.title: ATP Final: Brisbane
programme.desc: The Brisbane International comes to an end with the men's singles final, as the top-seeded Holger Rune goes toe to toe with the 2017 champion and second seed, Grigor Dimitrov. (07.01).

programme.title: The Open Films: Leonard 1997
programme.desc: A look back at some of the best contests at The Open in years gone by. Here, a look at 1997, held at Royal Troon Golf Club, the venue for 2016's Open.

programme.title: The Open Championship Round 3 Hlts
programme.desc: Highlights from day three of The 152nd Open at Royal Troon. (20.07).

programme.title: T20 Blast Final 2019
programme.desc: A look back at a classic clash from the T20 Blast. Here, the dramatic 2019 final between the Essex Eagles and the Worcestershire Rapids at Edgbaston.

programme.title: T20 Blast Final 2018
programme.desc: A look back at a classic clash from the T20 Blast. Here, the dramatic 2018 final between the Worcestershire Rapids and the Sussex Sharks at Edgbaston.

programme.title: England v W Indies 2nd Test Hlts
programme.desc: Day three of the second Test match between England and the West Indies at Trent Bridge. (20.07).

programme.title: Best Of NFL 23/24
programme.desc: Boosted by victory in their Super Bowl rematch with Kansas City, the Eagles are back at Lincoln Financial Field for week 12. Their opponents, Buffalo, routed the Jets last week. (26.11).

programme.title: Fight Night Int: Beterbiev v Smith
programme.desc: In Quebec City, Callum Smith stands across the ring from Artur Beterbiev as the Liverpudlian attempts to topple the unified light heavyweight champion of the world. (13.01).

programme.title: Best of NFL (1hr)
programme.desc: In an NFC championship game rematch, the Eagles host the 49ers during week 13 of the season. Jalen Hurts lifted the Eagles to a league-best 10-1 record with victory over the Bills. (03.12).

programme.title: S/Lge: Hull FC v Wigan
programme.desc: Hull FC host Wigan Warriors in the Betfred Super League. (20.07).

programme.title: My Icon: Leon Pryce
programme.desc: Former Bradford Bulls and St Helens star Leon Pryce discusses the individuals that have inspired him in his life and career.

programme.title: Best of NFL 23/24 (15mins)
programme.desc: Bitesize highlights as the San Francisco 49ers and the Detroit Lions advance to the NFC Championship game with a Super Bowl bid on the line. (28.01).

programme.title: Best of NFL 23/24 (15mins)
programme.desc: Bitesize highlights of Super Bowl LVIII, coming from Las Vegas, as the San Francisco 49ers and the Kansas City Chiefs set up a repeat of the same game four years ago. (11.02).

programme.title: Super League Gold
programme.desc: Relive some classic Super League matches. Here, a look back at the 2011 Grand Final, as Leeds Rhinos and St Helens met at Old Trafford at the curtain-closer of Super League XVI.

programme.title: LIVE: Currie Cup: Griffons v W.P
programme.desc: A Currie Cup Premier Division contest between NovaVit Griffons and DHL Western Province at DHL Stadium in Cape Town, South Africa. (21.07).

programme.title: Best of NFL (1hr)
